description: I've got the perfect tool for you, it'll just take a bit of time to craft. It's a /b/Steam Mining Drill/b/! These can mine in a much larger space than regular ol' pickaxes can; 3x3 to be exact. Not only will you be able to mine more efficiently, but you'll be able to make beautiful tunnels with ease.

Want to know something cool? This drill --silk touches-- blocks as well! I know right? It's awesome! This way you'll get --way-- more bang for your buck when you pair it with the Forge Hammer since you can crush full ores instead of starting from raw ores.

One small... would you call it a downside? You need to power it. For some reason, the drill itself never actually breaks, but you'll need to feed it water and some type of burnable fuel; for example coal or lignite. Just right click the fuel items into your drill within your inventory to fill it up!

A tip for you: Carry around a water bucket. Not only will this allow you to negate fall damage if you're skilled enough, but also as a source of water to run your drill off of. For some reason, depending on the use case, this world's water sources are infinite; use this to your advantage.
A --second-- tip: Crouch to mine single blocks if you need! They'll still be in the silktouch form, but it wont do the 3x3, incase you need to mine blocks more delicately.
